title.narrative: Tranforming lives through WASH, Boane District

description.narrative: Boane District, Mozambique: The project goal is "to improve the living conditions of 91,744 people in Boane District through increased access to equitable, inclusive and sustainable WASH services."

participating-org.narrative: Associaçao para o Desenvolvimento da Comunidade

activity-date.narrative: Date that project is due to end
Date that project started to the nearest quarter

mailing-address.narrative: Open data at WaterAid, 47-49 Durham Street, London, SE11 5JD, UK
